name: System Architecture Overview
description: High-level system architecture showing main components and their interactions
code:
graph TB
    subgraph "Client Layer"
        Web[Web Client]
        Mobile[Mobile App]
        API_Client[API Client]
    end
    
    subgraph "API Gateway"
        Gateway[API Gateway]
    end
    
    subgraph "Microservices"
        Auth[Authentication Service]
        User[User Service]
        Order[Order Service]
        Payment[Payment Service]
        Notification[Notification Service]
    end
    
    subgraph "Data Stores"
        UserDB[(User DB)]
        OrderDB[(Order DB)]
        PaymentDB[(Payment DB)]
        MessageQueue[Message Queue]
    end
    
    Web --> Gateway
    Mobile --> Gateway
    API_Client --> Gateway
    
    Gateway --> Auth
    Gateway --> User
    Gateway --> Order
    Gateway --> Payment
    
    Auth --> UserDB
    User --> UserDB
    Order --> OrderDB
    Payment --> PaymentDB
    
    Order --> MessageQueue
    Payment --> MessageQueue
    MessageQueue --> Notification
    
    style Gateway fill:#e1f5fe
    style Auth fill:#e8f5e8
    style MessageQueue fill:#fff3e0

name: User Authentication Flow
description: Complete user authentication and authorization workflow
code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant U as User
    participant F as Frontend
    participant A as Auth Service
    participant D as Database
    participant N as Notification
    
    U->>F: Login Request
    F->>A: Authenticate User
    A->>D: Verify Credentials
    D-->>A: User Data
    A->>A: Generate JWT Token
    A-->>F: Token + User Info
    F->>F: Store Token
    F-->>U: Redirect to Dashboard
    
    Note over U,N: User is now authenticated
    
    U->>F: Access Protected Resource
    F->>A: Validate Token
    A-->>F: Token Valid
    F-->>U: Show Resource
    
    Note over U,N: Token expires
    
    U->>F: Access Resource
    F->>A: Validate Token
    A-->>F: Token Invalid
    F-->>U: Redirect to Login

name: Database Schema
description: Entity relationship diagram showing database structure
code:
erDiagram
    USER {
        int id PK
        string username
        string email
        string password_hash
        datetime created_at
        datetime updated_at
        boolean is_active
    }
    
    PROFILE {
        int id PK
        int user_id FK
        string first_name
        string last_name
        string avatar_url
        text bio
        datetime created_at
    }
    
    POST {
        int id PK
        int user_id FK
        string title
        text content
        string status
        datetime published_at
        datetime created_at
        datetime updated_at
    }
    
    COMMENT {
        int id PK
        int post_id FK
        int user_id FK
        text content
        datetime created_at
        datetime updated_at
    }
    
    TAG {
        int id PK
        string name
        string slug
        datetime created_at
    }
    
    POST_TAG {
        int post_id FK
        int tag_id FK
    }
    
    USER ||--o{ PROFILE : "has"
    USER ||--o{ POST : "creates"
    USER ||--o{ COMMENT : "writes"
    POST ||--o{ COMMENT : "has"
    POST ||--o{ POST_TAG : "has"
    TAG ||--o{ POST_TAG : "belongs_to"

name: CI/CD Pipeline
code:
graph TD
    A[Code Commit] --> B[GitHub Actions]
    B --> C{Lint & Test}
    C -->|Pass| D[Build Application]
    C -->|Fail| E[Notify Developer]
    E --> F[Fix Issues]
    F --> A
    
    D --> G[Run Tests]
    G -->|Pass| H[Build Docker Image]
    G -->|Fail| E
    
    H --> I[Push to Registry]
    I --> J[Deploy to Staging]
    J --> K[Run E2E Tests]
    K -->|Pass| L[Deploy to Production]
    K -->|Fail| M[Rollback]
    M --> E
    
    L --> N[Health Check]
    N -->|Pass| O[Notify Success]
    N -->|Fail| M
    
    style A fill:#e1f5fe
    style L fill:#e8f5e8
    style E fill:#fce4ec
    style M fill:#fff3e0

name: Project Development Timeline
description: Gantt chart showing project phases and milestones
code:
gantt
    title Project Development Timeline
    dateFormat  YYYY-MM-DD
    
    section Planning
    Requirements Analysis    :req, 2024-01-01, 7d
    System Design          :design, after req, 10d
    Architecture Review    :arch, after design, 3d
    
    section Development
    Frontend Development   :frontend, after arch, 21d
    Backend Development    :backend, after arch, 21d
    API Integration       :api, after frontend, 7d
    
    section Testing
    Unit Testing          :unit, after backend, 7d
    Integration Testing   :integration, after api, 7d
    E2E Testing           :e2e, after integration, 5d
    
    section Deployment
    Staging Deployment    :staging, after e2e, 2d
    Production Deployment :deploy, after staging, 1d
    
    section Post-Launch
    Monitoring Setup      :monitor, deploy, 3d
    Documentation        :docs, deploy, 5d

name: Order Processing States
description: State diagram showing order processing workflow
code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Pending
    Pending --> Confirmed : Payment Received
    Pending --> Cancelled : User Cancels
    
    Confirmed --> Processing : Inventory Check
    Confirmed --> Cancelled : Out of Stock
    
    Processing --> Shipped : Order Prepared
    Processing --> Cancelled : Processing Failed
    
    Shipped --> Delivered : Package Received
    Shipped --> Returned : Customer Returns
    
    Delivered --> Completed : Order Closed
    Delivered --> Returned : Customer Returns
    
    Returned --> Refunded : Refund Processed
    
    Cancelled --> [*]
    Completed --> [*]
    Refunded --> [*]

name: Network Topology
description: Network architecture showing security zones and connections
code:
graph TB
    subgraph "Internet"
        Internet[Internet]
    end
    
    subgraph "DMZ"
        LB[Load Balancer]
        WAF[Web Application Firewall]
        VPN[VPN Gateway]
    end
    
    subgraph "Application Layer"
        Web[Web Servers]
        App[Application Servers]
        API[API Gateway]
    end
    
    subgraph "Data Layer"
        DB[(Primary Database)]
        Cache[(Redis Cache)]
        Backup[(Backup Database)]
        Storage[(File Storage)]
    end
    
    subgraph "Monitoring"
        Monitor[Monitoring System]
        Logs[Log Aggregator]
        Alert[Alert System]
    end
    
    Internet --> LB
    Internet --> VPN
    
    LB --> WAF
    WAF --> Web
    
    Web --> App
    App --> API
    
    API --> DB
    API --> Cache
    API --> Storage
    
    DB --> Backup
    
    App --> Monitor
    Monitor --> Logs
    Logs --> Alert
    
    style Internet fill:#e1f5fe
    style WAF fill:#fff3e0
    style DB fill:#e8f5e8
    style Monitor fill:#f3e5f5

name: Error Handling Flow
code:
graph TD
    A[Request Received] --> B{Validate Input}
    B -->|Valid| C[Process Request]
    B -->|Invalid| D[Return 400 Error]
    
    C --> E{Process Success?}
    E -->|Yes| F[Return Success Response]
    E -->|No| G[Log Error]
    
    G --> H{Retryable Error?}
    H -->|Yes| I[Increment Retry Count]
    H -->|No| J[Return 500 Error]
    
    I --> K{Max Retries?}
    K -->|No| L[Wait & Retry]
    K -->|Yes| M[Return 500 Error]
    
    L --> C
    
    D --> N[Log Error]
    J --> N
    M --> N
    
    N --> O[Send Alert]
    O --> P[Monitor Dashboard]
    
    style A fill:#e1f5fe
    style F fill:#e8f5e8
    style D fill:#fce4ec
    style J fill:#fce4ec
    style M fill:#fce4ec

name: Domain Model
description: Class diagram showing core domain entities and relationships
code:
classDiagram
    class User {
        +String id
        +String email
        +String name
        +UserRole role
        +DateTime createdAt
        +DateTime updatedAt
        +authenticate(password)
        +updateProfile(data)
        +hasPermission(permission)
    }
    
    class Project {
        +String id
        +String name
        +String description
        +ProjectStatus status
        +DateTime createdAt
        +DateTime updatedAt
        +addMember(user)
        +removeMember(user)
        +updateStatus(status)
    }
    
    class Task {
        +String id
        +String title
        +String description
        +TaskPriority priority
        +TaskStatus status
        +DateTime dueDate
        +DateTime createdAt
        +assignTo(user)
        +updateStatus(status)
        +addComment(comment)
    }
    
    class Comment {
        +String id
        +String content
        +DateTime createdAt
        +User author
        +edit(content)
        +delete()
    }
    
    class Notification {
        +String id
        +String type
        +String message
        +Boolean isRead
        +DateTime createdAt
        +markAsRead()
        +delete()
    }
    
    User ||--o{ Project : "owns"
    User ||--o{ Task : "assigned_to"
    User ||--o{ Comment : "writes"
    User ||--o{ Notification : "receives"
    Project ||--o{ Task : "contains"
    Task ||--o{ Comment : "has"
    Task ||--o{ Notification : "triggers"
